mapper.insert: merge into cart_tbl c using dual on (c.mem_id=#{mem_id} and c.pdt_num=#{pdt_num}) when matched then update set cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount} when not matched then insert (cart_code, pdt_num, mem_id, cart_amount) values(seq_cart_code.NEXTVAL, #{pdt_num}, #{mem_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: select C.cart_code, C.cart_amount, P.pdt_num, P.pdt_name, P.pdt_price, P.pdt_discount, P.pdt_img from(select cart_code, pdt_num, mem_id, cart_amount from cart_tbl where mem_id=#{mem_id}) C inner join product_tbl P on C.pdt_num = P.pdt_num
mapper.delete: delete from cart_tbl where pdt_num=#{pdt_num} and mem_id=#{mem_id}
